column3: Traffic; Koh Kong: The Police Commissioner of Koh Kong said that at 1:10 pm on April 22
column4: 2019 the was a traffic accident in Peam Kang village
column8: driven by a Chinese man ZHANG JUNHONG hit a motorbike without a license plate
column9: ridden by a Khmer man from Kirivong district
column10: Takeo province. The rider seriously injured his head.------After the incident
column11: police visited the scene and sent the victim for treatment at Sre Ambil Referral Hospital
column12: while both vehicles were sent to the traffic office.------Local police have confirmed that the cause of crash was the car driving at high speed.
